title: Roasted duck breast in aji amarillo, white miso, lime and marjoram with pickled daikon and cucumber
description: Aji amarillo is a Peruvian chilli that gives a hot but fruity kick to the richness of duck.
ingredients: 2.5cm/1in fresh root ginger, grated then squeezed, juice only
24-32 cucumber pearls (tiny balls made with very small melon baller)
